definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: She felt a bit comfortlessness to his licentious behavior.
sentences.chinese: 她对他放肆的行为感到有点不舒服。

sentences.english: The whole shebang smells sort of fishy to me.
sentences.chinese: 整个事情使我觉得有点蹊跷。

sentences.english: This is somewhat like platonic cross-sex friendships.
sentences.chinese: 这有点像柏拉图式的异性友谊。

sentences.english: But the commercial media... it's horrible.
sentences.chinese: 但商业传媒就有点糟糕了。

sentences.english: Sasuke sort of looks like itachi in this picture.
sentences.chinese: 佐助有点像在看这张照片鼬。

sentences.english: In a funny way, it was the last day at Highbury.
sentences.chinese: 在海布里的最后一天，这多少让人觉得有点不舒服。

sentences.english: A little down? Do you mean move it down to the left?
sentences.chinese: 有点往下？你的意思是说把它往左边移下一点。

sentences.english: No, thanks, I'm a bit tipsy.
Greek men were said to be a bit too soppy .
sentences.chinese: 希腊男人被认为有点“过于缠绵”。

sentences.english: His knee is misshapen or unequipped to move.
sentences.chinese: 他的膝盖有点正常，也不能动。

sentences.english: It was only a tummy ache.
The wall behind looks a bit grey and dull.
sentences.chinese: 后面那堵墙看起来有点灰暗。

sentences.english: The leadership of North Korea could be a poisoned chalice.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜领导层有点像一只被下毒的圣杯。

sentences.english: But when I did, the faces in the front row looked a little gray. Beyond that were questions and answers.
sentences.chinese: 但当我抬头的时候，发现前排的人都有点面如死灰。

sentences.english: Breeze Xin I say the time of this sentence, seem to be to have a little out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 风间欣吾说这句话的时候，显得有点上气不接下气。

sentences.english: Here are some shortbread and some home-made cakes.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有点饼干和自己家做的蛋糕。

definition: straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
seemingly/apparently/looks as if/appear to be/gives the impression that/seems on the face of it to be
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
